column4: I have figured out how to rip a .vob file from my dvd, then extract an .ac3 file from the audio stream I want.  Now I have a vob file and an ac3 file.  would someone please help me to make an x264-encoded?synched? .avi or .mp4 file using the two files?
you can use avidemux for that I think
loads of forums and answers online...
